update pms_qual
pro_color = #{proColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_capacity = #{proCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_height = #{proHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pro_diameter_outside = #{proDiameterOutside,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pro_stock = #{proStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_remarks = #{proRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pro_type = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pms_qual set pro_color = #{proColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_capacity = #{proCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_height = #{proHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_diameter_body = #{proDiameterBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_diameter_outside = #{proDiameterOutside,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_diameter_inside = #{proDiameterInside,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_contour = #{proContour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_material = #{proMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_stock = #{proStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_remarks = #{proRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pro_type = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
